meanings.definition: The quantity that a tablespoon can hold, typically used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: Mom added two tablespoonsful of sugar to the cake batter.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for three tablespoonsful of olive oil.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled a tablespoonsful of salt, creating a salty mess in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The lake was so calm that it seemed to hold a tablespoonsful of silence.
meanings.sent5: The child carefully measured out the tablespoonsful of flour, feeling like a professional chef.

meanings.sent1: She needed four tablespoonsful of spices for the curry.
meanings.sent2: The jar contained several tablespoonsful of colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent3: The kids were amazed by the rainbow of tablespoonsful of candy in the jar.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in thousands of tablespoonsful of fallen leaves.
meanings.sent5: The shelves were filled with tablespoonsful of different types of pasta.
